summary: A physician who initiates a relationship with the carpenter renovating her apartment decides to go on a vacation with him, but their respective children and her parents get in the way.
cast: Izabella Scorupco|David Hellenius|Suzanne Reuter|Claes Ljungmark|Philip Zandén|Cecilia Ljung|Dag Malmberg|Peter Engman|Malin Arvidsson|Peter Magnusson|Caisa Ankarsparre|Anders Axén|Emelie Beckius|Anna Mercedes Bergion|Christian Fiedler|Benny Hald|Anita Heikkilä|Joakim Höglund|Michael Ingvarson|Joel Kullberg|Jimmy Lagnefors|David Levi|Lukas Lundgren|Christina Luoma|Bo Lyckman|EvaMaria Oria|Birgitta Pettersson|Sten Raner|Magnus Sundberg|Malin Tengvard|Jonas Tjällman|Stellan von Reybekiel|Kalle Westerdahl|Paloma Winneth
title: Micke y Veronica
